attributes.action: Demand the U.K. government to start a Public Enquiry.
attributes.additional_details: To debate and form a motion for a public enquiry into child grooming, and stop it happening again.
attributes.background: Form an independent public enquiry into child grooming, to learn lessons to stop it happening

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
